AD.zh-CN: 可用 for daylight 运行

AL.en: Operative (or reoperative) subject to previously published limitations/conditions
AL.zh-CN: Operative (or reoperative) subject to previously published limitations/conditions

AU.zh-CN: Not 可用 (specify reason if appropriate)

AX.zh-CN: Previously promulgated shutdown has been canceled

CI.en: Identification or radio call sign changed to
CI.zh-CN: Identification or radio call sign changed to

HB.zh-CN: Friction coefficient is ... (specify friction measurement device used)

HF.zh-CN: Totally free of snow and ice

HJ.zh-CN: Launch planned ... HN.zh-CN: Covered by wet snow or slush to a depth of

HT.zh-CN: 进近 according to 信号 区域 only

HU.en: Launch in progress ... HU.zh-CN: Launch in progress ... HZ.zh-CN: Covered by frozen ruts and ridges
